CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the notification is valid for the current organization, based on the auto-populated field OriginOrganizationId__c. Notifications are valid if they have been created - or modified - in the current org. For partial & full-copy sandboxes, notifications cloned from production (or another sandbox) are considered invalid until they have been modified in the current org.
CustomField.label: Origin Organization ID Is Valid
